member.name: IDirect3DStateBlock9.Apply
member.summary: Apply the state block to the current device state.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, the return value is D3D_OK. If the method fails while in record mode, the return value is D3DERR_INVALIDCALL.

member.name: IDirect3DStateBlock9.Capture
member.summary: Capture the current value of states that are included in a stateblock.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, the return value is D3D_OK. If the method fails because capture cannot be done while in record mode, the return value is D3DERR_INVALIDCALL.

member.name: IDirect3DStateBlock9.GetDevice
member.param: Pointer to the IDirect3DDevice9 interface that is returned.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, the return value is D3D_OK. If the method fails, the return value can be D3DERR_INVALIDCALL.

member.name: IDirect3DStateBlock9
member.summary: Applications use the methods of the IDirect3DStateBlock9 interface to encapsulate render states.
